item.title: What is this?
item.description: I guess I’m going to blog now. The posts on this site are going to be a stream of consciousness. The content will widely vary. There will likely be mistaks in my posts. If you do find mistaks, I welcome your corrections. The best way to contact me is through LinkedIn.
